text: Yeah was looking more for the example use of hubl cms fields as well. Sadly its still early doors on this but would love to be able to understand how to use the HS CMS so that we can change the content also or whether you can get this info from an api etc to the react app itself.
Is there a channel specifically for Custom Objects?
Is there a way to add version numbers to the end of HubSpot stylesheets like you can with WordPress?
